main event: A single round, small, blue object emitting sparks was observed moving northeast in Homerville, Georgia.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 10 minutes and was still visible during that time, The object bobbed up and down at a 45-degree elevation, The sighting was made by an unknown policeman from the local police department, The weather conditions included winds coming from the west, The final conclusion was that the object was probably a balloon.
sighted object: a small round blue object with sparks
witness description: unknown policeman from the local police department
